webscript.description:
Promotes a user to a NetworkAdmin on a Tenant.

The body content should have the form: 

   {
      "username" : "person@company.com"
   }
The username must already exist or a 400 will be returned. The username must refer to a user who has the account as their home account, or a 403 will be returned. External users cannot be NetworkAdmins.
